{"id":574852649,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 2 months","timestamp":1634818570,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2780 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/574852649/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def reformat(self, s: str) -> str:\n        result = \"\"\n        numcnt = 0\n        ltrcnt = 0\n        ls = len(s)\n        for c in s:\n            numcnt += c.isnumeric()\n            ltrcnt += c.isalpha()\n        lookingfor = ltrcnt < numcnt # False = number, True = letter\n        i = 0\n        found = False\n        while len(s) > 0:\n            if (s[i].isnumeric() and lookingfor) or (s[i].isalpha() and not lookingfor):\n                lookingfor = not lookingfor\n                result += s[i]\n                s = s[:i] + s[i+1:]\n                i -= 1\n                found = True\n            i = (i+1) % max(1,len(s))\n            if i == 0:\n                if not found:\n                    break\n                found = False\n        return result if len(result) == ls else ''","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
